message.content: Chuck, Please find attached the economy agreement for the project Nicotine in hair as a marker for ETS exposure and invoice No 45047 on NOK 722,500 from Odd Nilsen. Odd wants this invoice to be paid as soon as possible to avoid a price rise on GC-MS on April 25. Please advise if there are any problems. Best regards, Sigeth Sigstta Lewander
